metadata.title: CVE-2015-8837 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the isofs_real_readdir function in isofs.cin FuseISO 20070708 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a long pathnamein an ISO file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8837` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fuseiso - 20070708-3+deb7u1ubuntu14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fuseiso package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20070708-3+deb7u1ubuntu14.04.1').
